title: The Villages Crush a Grassroots Revolt
description:
Residents of the Florida retirement community banded together to reject a property tax hike but were blocked by powerful players — including Ron DeSantis.

The post The Villages Crush a Grassroots Revolt appeared first on The Intercept.

title: The Four Horsemen of Inflation
description:
War, pestilence, climate change, and the rich.

The post The Four Horsemen of Inflation appeared first on The Intercept.

title: The Myth of Safe Plastics Persists, Despite Risk of Disasters Like East Palestine
description:
The vinyl lobby has poured millions of dollars over the years into convincing lawmakers that PVC plastic is safe and sustainable.

The post The Myth of Safe Plastics Persists, Despite Risk of Disasters Like East Palestine appeared first on The Intercept.
